description: As Trevor Jones has his morning coffee, he waits for boyfriend Mark Long to start his day after his late night out. Trevor asks him if it was any good, and Mark begins to describe his hook-up with a random hottie. Trevor isn't that concerned, but Mark tells him he has nothing to worry about anyway, and proceeds to tell Trevor all about his fantasy of sharing his hook-up with Trevor. Trevor licks his lips at the thought and Mark takes him to the bedroom to prove Trevor is the only one for Mark. Mark's passion is apparent, and it's obvious that the hook-up has only served to strengthen Mark's lust for his boyfriend, as he gives Trevor the fuck of his life, pounding him all over the bed before fucking the cum out of him. As Mark unleashes his load all over Trevor, the two of them lay there in a sweaty mess, certain to resume this fantasy as soon as possible. Enjoy!
title: Open Relationships Part 1 - Not as Good as You
